title: Is late game jax overrated?
body: Yes, he is definitely one of the strongest duelist at 1v1, but his team fighting potential sucks compare to someone like Yasuo, who is more mobile, has still amazing damage, and a lot of outplay potential with his cc and wind wall he can provide to the entire team. In a way, I feel like jax needs a slight rework that will buff him to make him more relevant in team fights, but not a super buff to the point of bringing back beta Jax. Pantheon could also use a rework to make him more relevant to late game. I feel like both these champs are very outdated in terms of mechanics and kit. Pretty easy and straightforward champs without much mobility or outplay potential.
